summary: 2000 DODGE NEON LEAKS WHEN IT RAINS.  TONS OF WATER ON THE FLOOR BOARD IN THE BACK SEAT AND IN THE TRUNK.  SO BAD THAT IT HAS TO BE BAILED OUT AND STAYS WET. DEALERSHIP REFUSES TO DO ANYTHING BECAUSE THE CAR IS NO LONGER UNDER WARRANTY.  WE FEEL THIS IS A DEFECT AND SHOULD BE FIXED AT NO COST TO US AND HAS NOTHING TO DO WITH A WARRANTY.  WE BOUGHT THE CAR USED IN JAN OF 2002.
